did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Nicaragua. Guardia Nacional processed materials : The official list of contacts of the Guardia Nacional de Nicaragua / Division of Operations and Intelligence, GN-2, GN-3, Headquarters, Guardia Nacional.
did.abstract: Inventories armed encounters between units of the Guardia Nacional of Nicaragua and insurrectionary forces from 1927 to 1932, with date, place, description of encounter and number of casualties for each incident. Also includes list of United States Marine Corps personnel killed while serving as officers of the Guardia Nacional during this period.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Nicaragua. Guardia Nacional processed materials : The official list of contacts of the Guardia Nacional de Nicaragua / Division of Operations and Intelligence, GN-2, GN-3, Headquarters, Guardia Nacional., [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1990.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Inventories armed encounters between units of the Guardia Nacional of Nicaragua and insurrectionary forces from 1927 to 1932, with date, place, description of encounter and number of casualties for each incident. Also includes list of United States Marine Corps personnel killed while serving as officers of the Guardia Nacional during this period.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Guerrillas--Nicaragua.
